pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression Standardization for Causal Inference // Contains more modern tools for causal inference using regression standardization. Four general classes of models are implemented; generalized linear models, conditional generalized estimating equation models, Cox proportional hazards models, and shared frailty gamma-Weibull models. Methodological details are described in Sjlander, A. (2016) doi:10.1007/s10654-016-0157-3. Also includes functionality for doubly robust estimation for generalized linear models in some special cases, and the ability to implement custom models.
